title: Mobile fixes & Dex Preferences expansion
features: Split up the options to block GO and NO OT exclusive shinies into two separate options.
Added a option to completly hide all locked pokemon.
Added new Dex Preferences to change the view mode of the dex to categorized or alphabetical.
fixes: Resolved a critical mobile bug where clicking a caught Pok√©mon slot in the main grid caused data loss.
Fixed a issue on certain mobile devices where the sidebar would appear on all taps instead of holds.

Bug fixes & compatibility improvements for iOS devices. (Needs Testing)

title: Alpha Regional Forms added & Removed Kantonian Electrode
features: Alpha Alolan Raichu added.
Galarian Alpha Slowpoke line added.
Galarian Alpha Stunfisk added.
Alpha Johto Qwilfish added.
You can now update your account's email address from the settings page.
fixes: Alpha Kantonian Electrode removed from Alpha Genders & Other's category.
Fixed scrollbar not appearing in certain situations.
Unique IDs added to all Pokemon, Forms, and other data for future proofing, performance and stability.
Fixed alignment of the search icon on the changelogs page.
Fixed a bug where clicking Mark All with a locked pokemon would set the locked pokemon as caught.
Accent color buttons in the settings page now display a checkmark to clearly show the selected color.

title: Legends Z-A Pokemon Added & Some Small Features/Fixes
features: All Legends Z-A and Mega Dimensions DLC Pokemon added and will now show under the obtainable games section along with all the alpha forms
When searching for a Pokemon by name a new switch will appear allowing you to show that Pokemon's evolutions also in the search results
Legends Z-A added with all methods and shiny odds when tracking a hunt
Sidebar will now display how long the hunt took if you use the built-in counter on the website
Sidebar will now automatically display the shiny odds and will ask for modifiers (shiny charm, sparkling power, etc.) when tracking a hunt
Shiny Charm button added under the search that allows you to manage the games you have shiny charm so it auto sets the modifier when you add a pokemon or hunt
Shiny Charm button seconds as a display to show off what games you have shiny charm on when viewing a profile
2 NEW settings added to show a lock icon over shiny locked pokemon and/or Pokemon GO & NO OT exclusive shinies
fixes: Changed wording for some tags in the sidebar such as Male now says Male Form and Female now says Female Form
Alpha Others category now organized by dex number instead of Hisui dex order
Sidebar icons replaced with actual SVG icons instead of basic emojis
Many performance improvements and code cleanup

title: Admin Badge, Profile Icon Cleanup & Some Other Fixes
features: Crown icon added to admin profile pages and trainers page
Tooltips added to admin crown icon and sharable link icon
Instagram & tiktok icons added to the footer
fixes: Fixed loading screen visual issue where spinner and dots appeared merged together
Hovering the likes button will no longer have a background color
Likes button will now be colored red when viewing a profile not logged in
Improved sanitization of input fields to prevent XSS attacks
